remarks: Membership in a one-parameter class of sets, indexed by arbitrary base sets.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
statement:
elmptrab2.f $e |- F = ( x e. _V |-> { y e. B | ph } ) $.
elmptrab2.s1 $e |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elmptrab2.s2 $e |- ( x = X -> B = C ) $.
elmptrab2.ex $e |- B e. V $.
elmptrab2.rc $e |- ( Y e. C -> X e. W ) $.
elmptrab2 $p |- ( Y e. ( F ` X ) <-> ( Y e. C /\ ps ) ) $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d W x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ps x y $.
